summary: This is an email from December 16, 2021, relaying the contents of a phone conversation with an unnamed individual. The individual states he has not been subpoenaed, contacted by the defense, or notified to testify in the Epstein case, and claims his last contact regarding Epstein was with law enforcement during the search of the Palm Beach mansion. He expresses willingness to speak with prosecutors.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as a detective on the NYPD/FBI task force, who relays a conversation with another individual about the Epstein case.

events.title: Search of Palm Beach Mansion
events.description: Law enforcement conducted a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach mansion.

events.title: Phone Conversation Regarding Witness Status
events.description: A phone conversation occurred where an individual stated he had not been subpoenaed, contacted by the defense, or notified to testify in the Epstein case, and was unaware he was on a defense witness list.

keyFacts: An individual, whose name is not provided in the extract, claims he has not been subpoenaed or contacted by the defense in the Epstein case.
The individual states he is unaware he is on a defense witness list and does not know why he would be called, as he claims to know nothing.
The individual's last contact regarding Jeffrey Epstein was with law enforcement during the execution of a search warrant at the Palm Beach mansion.
The individual expressed willingness to speak with prosecutors if they wanted to talk to him.
The information is relayed in an email from a detective on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
